languages.text: "Как странно... Сей плющ окрасил все вокруг в едко-зеленый цвет, как окрашивает хищник свою добычу перед прыжком. Я ранее не встречала растений с собственным цветом".

traits.locale_text: "Как странно... Сей плющ окрасил все вокруг в едко-зеленый цвет, как окрашивает хищник свою добычу перед прыжком. Я ранее не встречала растений с собственным цветом".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."
languages.original_text: "Как странно... Сей плющ окрасил все вокруг в едко-зеленый цвет, как окрашивает хищник свою добычу перед прыжком. Я ранее не встречала растений с собственным цветом".

traits.locale_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings a caustic green, just like a predator colours its prey before the pounce. Never before have I seen a plant with a colour of its own."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「なんて不思議なんでしょう…このツタはプレデターが獲物を襲う直前のように、周囲を苛烈な緑色に染めています。自らの色を染められる植物を見たのは初めてです」
languages.original_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて不思議なんでしょう…このツタはプレデターが獲物を襲う直前のように、周囲を苛烈な緑色に染めています。自らの色を染められる植物を見たのは初めてです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Qué curioso... está liana cubre su entorno de un verde cáustico de la misma manera que un depredador aísla a su presa antes de abalanzarse. Nunca había visto una planta capaz de proyectar su propio color».
languages.original_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."

traits.locale_text: «Qué curioso... está liana cubre su entorno de un verde cáustico de la misma manera que un depredador aísla a su presa antes de abalanzarse. Nunca había visto una planta capaz de proyectar su propio color».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “真奇怪……这株藤蔓把周围都染上了那种可怕的绿色，就仿佛捕食者标记猎物一样。我从未见过哪种植物能够向周围投射自己的颜色。”
languages.original_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."

traits.locale_text: “真奇怪……这株藤蔓把周围都染上了那种可怕的绿色，就仿佛捕食者标记猎物一样。我从未见过哪种植物能够向周围投射自己的颜色。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est étrange... Ce lierre a coloré son environnement d'un vert caustique, tel un prédateur qui sélectionne sa proie avant d'attaquer. Je n'avais jamais vu une plante capable de faire ça. »
languages.original_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."

traits.locale_text: « C'est étrange... Ce lierre a coloré son environnement d'un vert caustique, tel un prédateur qui sélectionne sa proie avant d'attaquer. Je n'avais jamais vu une plante capable de faire ça. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie merkwürdig ... Dieser Efeu hat seine Umgebung in giftigen Grüntönen gefärbt, wie ein Raubtier seine Beute isoliert, ehe es angreift. Ich habe noch nie zuvor eine Pflanze gesehen, die in der Lage ist, ihre eigene Farbe abzugeben."
languages.original_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."

traits.locale_text: "Wie merkwürdig ... Dieser Efeu hat seine Umgebung in giftigen Grüntönen gefärbt, wie ein Raubtier seine Beute isoliert, ehe es angreift. Ich habe noch nie zuvor eine Pflanze gesehen, die in der Lage ist, ihre eigene Farbe abzugeben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne acayip... Bu sarmaşık, yakıcı bir yeşil tonuna boyamış... Üzerine atlamadan önce avını seçen bir avcı gibi. Daha önce hiç kendi rengini yansıtabilen bir bitki görmemiştim."
languages.original_text: "How strange... This ivy coloured its surroundings in a caustic green, just like a predator singles out its prey before pouncing. Never before have I seen a plant able to cast its own colour."
